ED LA 320F.title: Elementary Reading and Language Arts Teaching Methods
ED LA 320F.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED LA 320F.description: This course is designed to provide ESC and MST credential candidate with the knowledge and skills necessary to design and enact comprehensive English Language Arts instruction in self-contained, integrated and inclusive K-14 classrooms.
